page.title: 17APPLETON ROEBUCK VILLAGE 3
page.content: { "THE GALA"}is the event of the year both a a fund raiser for the school and as a social.Months of preparation, meticulous planning and last minute enthusiastic and feverish scrambling combine to produce "The Gala". Usually opened by a famous personality like{Ray Buckton}(an old pupil)the fun begins whilst the band plays.The stalls sell books, plants,toys, cakes, sweets in fact anything saleable.There are sideshows,a roundabout,a pony ride swings,a fortune tellerand many more. Then come the games or races,the Tug-o-war and the Peat Sack Race.All topped up with pop and ice-cream,and strawberry teas,with MC Denis Hudson urging all on to spend.At 4.15 comes the "Draw" for assorted prizes with cries of "It's a fix" mingling with shouts of joy.It never seems to rain on the first Saturday in July.
